summary: This bill, the Special Diabetes Program Reauthorization Act of 2025, aims to extend funding for Special Diabetes Programs for Type I diabetes. The bill, introduced in the House of Representatives by Ms. DeGette and others, proposes amending the Public Health Service Act to allocate $160,000,000 for each of fiscal years 2026 through 2030, with funds remaining available until spent. The bill is not subject to copyright and is in the public domain.
